dashboard.title: Dive into Languages
dashboard.subtitle: Explore, learn, and expand your vocabulary with ease.

success.heading: Perfect!
success.subheading: You can now attempt test or start anew with fresh flashcard set!

interrupt.title: Interrupt Test?
interrupt.subtitle: Are you sure you want to interrupt the ongoing test? Your current progress will be lost, and you'll be redirected back to the learning mode.

reset.title: Draw new set?
reset.subtitle: Are you sure you want to draw new flashcards set? Your current progress will be lost.

step1.title: Getting Started
step1.content: Start by considering the translation of the word in your mind, and then click the tab to discover the answer.

step2.title: How Did You Perform?
step2.content: Let us know if you knew the answer after revealing it.

step3.title: Tracking Your Progress
step3.content: Here, you can monitor how many flashcards from the set you've already seen.

step4.title: Check Your Score
step4.content: Discover how many points you've earned; points will be relevant later on.

step5.title: Starting Fresh
step5.content: Begin anew with a fresh deck of flashcards!

step6.title: Keep Going!
step6.content: Explore the possible challenges that lie ahead.
